entries.name: AZCORS
entries.description: Arizona Continuously Operating Reference Station Network

reference.description: Documentation of regions and datums. Also see the geodnet/GEODNET_RTK_SERVICE repo for URLs.

crss.name: NAD83(2011)
crss.description: Continental USA, after Guam and Hawaii

crss.name: China Geodetic Coordinate System 2000
crss.description: China. GEODNET does not provide RTK service in this region now, can broadcast partnerships’ RTK/VRS service in this region based on user requests.

crss.name: WGS 84 (G2139)
crss.description: This is the default for countries or regions not listed above.

streams.comments: AUTO provides corrections in static datums, with a fallback to WGS84. Guam and Hawaii aren't listed, so assume they are WGS84 as well.

reference.comments: Instructions to access PDF with mount points. Requires (free) account login.

streams.comments: CRS described in the PDF. All mountpoints use NAD83(2011) since 2019.
Our CRS had been switched from JGD2011 to JGD2024 in April 2025. This information will be updated once the EPSG code for JGD2024 is finalized.
All mountpoints use NAD83(2011)

streams.comments: In Europe Topcon uses different realizations of ETRS89, depending on the country.

entries.name: TrigNet
entries.description: South African National Geospatial Information (NGI) Network

streams.comments: Hartebeesthoek94 is the official datum in South Africa, but not what provides this service. The ITRF CRS may be updated to a newer version in the future.

reference.comments: CRS described in the STR string

streams.comments: CRS described in the STR string {"REF":{"NAME":"NZGD2000","ID":"ISO:199","EPOCH":2000.0}}

crss.name: RGF93 v2b
crss.description: France - onshore and offshore, mainland and Corsica

streams.comments: Despite the mountpoint name, coordinates are geodesic: Ellipsoidal height and no projection.
The geoid undulation must be applied by the receiver. ONLY HTRANS correction fixed by the VRS system on the server side.
